title: 3126 Clay Street
Reason(s) for removal: Precious branch failure, a vehicle accident has seen the tree lose two of its three remaining main stems, remaining stem is attached with included bark and is structurally unsound, no protection from prevailing wind; not replaceable due to proximity to street light

title: 1522 26th Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Has decay at branch unions, there are no adequate lateral limbs to reduce limb weight, tree will continue to fail and poses hazard for pedestrians and vehicles; will be replaced

title: 1655 Waller Street
Reason(s) for removal: Extensive decay in central/major branch union, canopy decline, Bailey's acacia trees have brittle wood making decay in branch union more concerning as it increases likelihood of branch failure; may be replaced depending on underground utility checks

title: 90X Guy Place
Reason(s) for removal: Dead, dangerous or likely to fall and is obstructing existing infrastructure (street light); cannot be replaced due to conflict with underground utilites and proximity to street light

title: 169 6th Street
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction (787665); unhealthy tree to be removed for 6th Street Pedestrian Safety Project which will widen sidewalk; removal site will be replaced and another tree planted around the corner on Natoma Street

title: 702 Foerster Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (786655); foundational damage to be repaired will destabilize tree, tree growing into home structure (roof), owner has flooding due to gaps in foundation where underground creek is eroding home and redwood has tapped into this water source; property owner will replace

title: 271 Upper Terrace
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction of new building

title: 303 Upper Terrace
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction of new building

title: 4500 17th Street
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction of new building (785313); will be replaced, additionally new trees will be planted to maximum capacity given site constraints of utilities, driveways, streetlights etc. around new parcels and buildings

title: 80 Pierce Streeet
Reason(s) for removal: 99% canopy dieback, decay in branch stubs; will be replaced

title: 3751 20th Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787719); tree meets ficus removal criteria; will be replaced

title: 145 Guerrero Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787703); Eucalyptus approved for removal due to significant westerly lean towards Guerrero and damage to fence; replacement tree will be planted somewhere else on the property

title: 7 Heyman Street
Reason(s) for removal: All residents on block contacted BUF to discuss tree removal, four of six ficus on block were approved for removal due to poor structure (codominant leaders, included bark); residents have committed to help watering reaplcement trees

title: 11 Heyman Street
Reason(s) for removal: All residents on block contacted BUF to discuss tree removal, four of six ficus on block were approved for removal due to poor structure (codominant leaders, included bark); residents have committed to help watering reaplcement trees

title: 1919 Palou Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Permit removal for construction of Palou Streetscape Project (787858); in decline; will be replaced

title: 1400 Palou Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Permit removal for construction of Palou Streetscape Project (787858); in very poor condition; will be replaced

title: 401 Orizaba Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: In very poor condition, growing too close to home, pushing against home, leaning over sidewalk obstructing pedestrian traffic, and roots are uplifting driveway; not replaceable due to proximity to existing infrastructure (house foundation and driveway)
